mapper.select: SELECT SUBJECT.*,A.MEMBERNUM AS sj_num, TEACHER.tc_name FROM SUBJECT,TEACHER,(SELECT STUDENT.sj_idx,COUNT(MEMNUM) AS MEMBERNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBJECT LEFT JOIN (SELECT sj_idx AS MEMNUM FROM REGIST)A ON SUBJECT.sj_idx=A.MEMNUM)STUDENT GROUP BY SJ_IDX)A WHERE SUBJECT.tc_idx=TEACHER.tc_idx AND SUBJECT.sj_idx=A.sj_idx
select distinct a.sj_idx,mem_hp,mem_name,mem_id,mem_birth from member, (select * from regist where sj_idx=#{sj_idx})a where member.mem_idx=a.mem_idx

SELECT SUBJECT.*,A.MEMBERNUM AS sj_num, TEACHER.tc_name FROM SUBJECT,TEACHER,(SELECT STUDENT.sj_idx,COUNT(MEMNUM) AS MEMBERNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBJECT LEFT JOIN (SELECT sj_idx AS MEMNUM FROM REGIST)A ON SUBJECT.sj_idx=A.MEMNUM)STUDENT GROUP BY SJ_IDX)A WHERE SUBJECT.tc_idx=TEACHER.tc_idx AND SUBJECT.sj_idx=A.sj_idx AND sj_sd > SYSDATE+7

select rownum as rnum, b.sj_idx, b.sj_name, c.tc_name, b.sj_sd, b.sj_ed, b.sj_st, b.sj_et, b.sj_sum from (select * from regist where mem_idx=#{mem_idx})a, subject b, teacher c where a.sj_idx = b.sj_idx and b.tc_idx = c.tc_idx and b.sj_ed > sysdate
